person.persName: James Nibert (Johnson County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Arminta Auxier Nibert on November 10, 1849. Father of Martha A. Nibert, Sarah K. Nibert, Samuel L. Nibert, Mary A. Nibert, James Nibert, and John H. Nibert. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850 and 1860. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in Johnson County as quartermaster from May 31, 1864.
